text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump TRUMP REMAINS TONE DEAF!!

As CV-19 rages thru America, TRUMP FANS THE FLAMES OF CORONAVIRUS! 

HE IGNORED the social distancing & mask wearing recommendations of all world health experts at his July 4th Campaign Rally at Mt. Rushmore!

TRUMP: A CLEAR & PRESENT DANGER TO EVERYONE https://t.co/7PuJN0CVd0
